__e: He's wonderful, Melissa, he's so nice...
Mr. President. My name is Melissa, and I wanted to ask what was it like becoming a president overnight?
I've been looking for the right time to tell you tonight, but Melissa and I are so excited because...
You've been through the good stuff, but Melissa's been to hell and back with me.
I do, and-and I would love to help if I could, but the truth is, I have no idea where Melissa is.
I was thrilled to get the family back together and Melissa's great in a crisis, but the person you want when you're dying isn't the same as the person you want when you're living.
